I think these would be comfortable if I could get them on. I get the toes in but the back collapses and I can't lift it into place so I can slide my foot all the way in. A shoe horn doesn't help at all and adds another problem which is that the tongue recedes into the shoe when I try using the horn. It's like I need three hands. I'm so impressed that other people don't seem to have these problems. I think I'll cut out the back and use them as slides. At least my toes will be happy.

I like them, think they’re cute! And they don’t make my foot look too big!

I will be buying another pair asap. I normally wear a 9.5 but got a size 9. They are a little tight at first but break in quickly. I have a bunion on my right foot and struggle finding comfy shoes. These did the job great!

They are a little to round at the toes for my liking. I do love the color and they seem to be holding up well for every day wear.

I have a size 8 1/2- which i love. 8 1/2 US/ 40 European size. I tried twice now to order that again and keep getting a size 8 US/ 39 European size. I order 8 1/2 and clearly get a shoe marked size 8. If you can get the size you order these shoes are soo comfy. If you can't, they don't fit. I love the look of these shoes and the gel insole. It just wore out quick and is a little too flat. Just becauae I have wide feet with bunions, doesn't mean I have flat feet that don't need support or cushion. Added insoles and it helps, just wish I didn't have to!
Shoe fits good but.. The fabric is very rough and stiff. I had to return 4 pair to get proper larger size. Just wish the fabric was softer.

These are my favorite barefoot shoes, after the hiking shoes I bought as my first foray into barefoot shoes. Comfortable and cute and flexible. I have been wearing them all the time since I purchased them a few weeks ago. I plan on getting them another colors.

So disappointed I had to return these shoes. There really are not slip on shoes. I had to struggle to put them on because the elastic is so tight. I absolutely LOVE these shoes.  Going to buy two more!!
The color was nice and vibrant, but the shoes were recieved completely compressed in a vacuumed sealed bag. I didn't even want to deal with that.
But super super cute. I will be returning and exchanging for one size up

I really like these shoes! They are so comfortable and the wide toe box is great for letting my toes have that natural spread. They are light weight and seem pretty durable. Don’t expect much arch support as these are more of a “barefoot” fit but the shape of the sole does off a little bit of support. I am a little disappointed in how quickly the fabric began to look dirty- I know, white shoes, what should I expect, but the canvas-type fabric definitely is not easily kept clean. But overall, I am glad I purchased these and they are a great casual sneaker for those that are looking for a more natural-shaped shoe.
Very unhappy with crazy amount of noise these make when I walk.  It is too bad because I love the wide width.
Definitely is not the size it says, looks like they run small
The shows were not the quality that I expected. I returned them.
Inside on the left shoe was not glued down good made a sore on my foot
They are cute and have lots of space for my toes.  They are great for walking on flat surfaces.  I have a rocky driveway and I can feel every rock.
These shoes are perfect for my wide feet. I was able to walk all day with no pain. I love them and will bw ordering different colors
These were not comfortable at all.
These are so cute. Toe box could be wider. Bought these to accommodate inserts. I usually wear a 7, These fit more like an 8, so I would go up 1/2 a size for a good fit.
I love these shoes. The design is cute, they are extremely roomy, and light. They are extremely comfortable ,a great value and really great quality shoe. I plan on ordering all the colors available.

I ended up cutting 2 out of the 4 so I could squeeze my feet in them Layout of the elastic is odd to. Maybe redo the layout and in addition to elastic, reduce from 4 to 3, and keep the angle look but make it Velcro so its adjustable (like some of the version of the keen shoes) The soles could be better. its not comfortable for long walks.  I brought them on vacation with me and ended up leaving it there. I really wanted to like them.
I have bought alot of so called wide width  shoes.  This shoe is a good wide.  I disagree  with people saying they run big.  I sized down and wish I hadn't.
Can wear with socks, feels awesome and love the look!

Having read reviews, I ordered my usual size, 8.5 ladies. The length is too short, however. I am returning & ordering size 9, because the toe box is nice & wide for my broken pinkie toe. The shoes are also really cute! I am returning Size 9 also. The toe box is too tight. Very disappointed.
The width for my toes was great, but the materials these shoes are made out of are stiff and hurt my feet just trying them on.  I am returning them

Got these to wear while I walk our dogs. Switching to barefoot shoes because of bunions. These seem very comfortable so far and I have no pain when I walk. I usually wear 7.5-8 in regular sneakers. The 7.5 were too small so I went up to 8.5 and these fit great.

I was really excited to get these shoes, I love the style and design! However, when my shoes arrived and I tried them on, they were too small and I had to send them back. I didn't use the size guide for my order, I went off my general shows size. That being said, I was going to reorder them and measured my foot in both standard and metric. The size my foot measured came back as ordering a smaller size than I did originally.
The toe box is perfect. I was stopped by several ladies at the grocery store to remark on how comfy they looked-and they loved the bright colors. Feels like wearing slippers.
Love love love these super comfortable fits incredible well and I like the green I picked out

I ordered wide but in my regular size, which turned out to be  comfy ! Have one foot a bit fatter . However , this shoe is designed that the toe room is wide enough on BOTH of my feet. I would recommend this shoe . The plus is that its a slip-on.
Love the shoes, just not sturdy or comfortable enough to wear all day.  Great for running quick errands.  They also run a little big in size.

评论概述: Somebody isnt doing their job correctly

I love my shoes but the back is scratchy. I had to put some heel cushions in so I wouldn’t get blisters. I wear them almost everyday. I wear them with and without socks.
I have wide feet. These shoes are so comfortable. I like them better than my slippers. Very nice looking as well. Great value

评论概述: Just what I was looking for

Fits true to size and they are comfortable.

I am only giving 4 stars because the sizing is a little off. I typically wear a women's 10 and these were too large. Maybe it is the style but I also usually buy extra wide width shoes and have not had issues. Problem was mostly corrected with a little cushion sticker thing to the heel. The pair I received are not symmetrical.  It is subtle but the right shoe is not cut right, see picture.  It looks flattened at the toe and then sewn tight, cutting off just enough space to make my 2 longest toes smooshed.  It seems something similar happened on that same shoe's heel.Now, I am basing this part of my review on the left shoe only.  The left shoe is cut normal and is very comfortable.  The material is breathable.  The width is wide enough for my foot, which has a 9" diameter at the arch.These can easily be my favorite if both were normal.Reluctantly I am sending them back.  I will think about ordering again hoping I get a perfect pair.

Great shoes fit very nicely love the wide box great for wide feet

评论概述: Will cut the back of your foot up if you don't wear socks

Love the way these look and fit. The sole is super flexible. The shoe itself doesn't need to be tied, which is SO AMAZING for a mom of 2 boys! I can slip them on and go. Color was lovely - a nice balance to hide the dirt and still not be super dark.  However, I had an issue with the seam at the heel. It felt like all the fabric from the heel came together in one spot, and it was very uncomfortable for me. I am unreasonably sensitive to seams and the like, so it is entirely possible that it was just me. Perhaps this could be overcome by thick socks or someone who is less sensitive to variation.
Fit is good ordered normal size. The color and style are cute

I wanted a spacious slip on shoe. Searched for that and discovered barefoot shoes! Got them today and have not taken them off in hours! My feet feel wonderful and are not sweating at all with no socks! I think I'm going to love these!
Bought them to get a little extra room up front but these sneakers were huge!  Had to send them back.

I received the shoes and they seem comfortable. I have a wide foot and the top part of the shoe fits well, but the back of the shoe where the heel is lifts when I walk. I had to order inserts so they don’t flap around .

My feet are short with a rectangular shape and so I have the hardest time finding comfortable shoes that dont squish in the toebox area. A lot of the wide and barefoot shoes look like clown shoes and so I've been on a mission to find something comfortable I can slip on that doesn't look completely dorky. I usually order 7.5 but since these didn't come in half sizes, I went for the 7. I was surprised to find that even the sevens are very loose on my feet. I tried these on really fast without socks, and so I'm hoping that socks will help the issue because my heel slides out with every step. They are really cute though and I'm almost tempted to order a 6 even though that is definitely NOT my shoe size at all. They feet okay in the length, but there is a lot of wiggle room all around. It would be nice if the elastics were a little tighter. These shoes would be great for pregnant women who have swollen feet (or anyone with swollen feet).
Not comfy
Fit is as expected. Comfortable and happy looking. Love them.

These shoes are hard to put on.  There  is no cushioning.  The canvas fabric is coarse.  I put socks on and I suppose that effects fit.  The size is correct and the toe box is great.  I will keep them.

评论概述: Width is comfortable enough to wear socks with it
评论详情: They are zero drop, and thin with a little bit of cushioning that you can take out if you want. I like the width and shape of the toe box for my foot. The ankle area is a little loose but comfortable. I can wear ankle heigh socks with it not being too tight. The sole is very flexible too, but not for the truly barefoot enthusiast. At first I felt the sole was a little wonky, I thought I felt a hump under my foot, but that went away, it resolved itself with just the first wear. They are a little matronly looking though, style wise, but comfy enough for casual wear. Definitely not grippy enough for working out. I got a 9.5 wide and I usually wear a women's 9.5, so I'd say it fits true to size
The best thing I have bought in awhile.  True to size. I’m a size 8 - love the widening..

评论概述: Great for wide or swollen feet!
评论详情: I ordered these because I have two problems wide feet and swollen feet, so my normal shoes didn't fit. These fit perfectly! I worn them over an hour and had no problems. Very comfortable. I would say they run true to size, but I ordered a half size bigger bc of my swollen feet and there's plenty of extra room. Getting another pair.
I like these shoes. They allow my for to stretch out.  But they could use memory foam for better comfort.
These shoes are beyond my expectations! Very comfortable - fit is great! Wide width shoes can be hard to find - these are perfect.

评论概述: Cute minimal barefoot shoe but the sizing is off!
评论详情: So I love the look of these but the sizing is very inaccurate. I wear 41s in several other barefoot brands. I measured my foot with those handy sizing tools and decided to order a 10…it swallowed my foot. Ordered a 9.5 (pictured) and it is still way too big! It’s both too long and very loose across my feet. My feet are probably average volume They do come with a flat insole that makes the fit a little better but with it in there isn’t enough space for my toes (height, width is ok!) and my heel still slips. So these will be a return for me.  The photo with the gray shoe is a Feelground hightop. They are the same length but the toe box isn’t as wide as the FGs  Honestly if you could find the right size for your foot they would be an ok reasonably priced barefoot shoe.

They were a little stiff at first but soften the more I wear them. My bunion and plantar fasciitis love them. I wish there was a little more arch support but the wide toes are absolutely amazing. I usually wear a 9. I ordered 9 wide and they are wide! If you're looking for fashion more than comfort, these shoes are probably not for you. But if you want want a little of both, I recommend getting these shoes. So comfortable.
Comfortable True to size Wide foot friendly Easy to slip on and off Great for quick running around or casual outings Will get dirty easily.

I always have a problem with my foot sensitivity especially my big toe. I started wearing ONLY closed toe shoes a year ago. but the problem is, 80% of the shoes that have a wide toe box are also a wide size. and that won't work for me. I was trying to kid myself and to keeping these because I really like them. BUT !! I'm having so much trouble I am thinking of wearing open toe shoes again and just hope I don't run into anything with the little piggy that went to market.

I love zero drop/minimalist shoes. These fit as expected. The toe and heel areas are quite stiff though and need some "breaking in" but other than that they're comfortable. I wore them recently to a family reunion and was on my feet for 4-5 hours on hard floors and didn't end up with sore feet.
These are so comfy and cute. They don’t hurt your heels and are comfortable. They are a must have

评论概述: Run large - might want to size down
评论详情: I ordered these in a size 6 for my teenage daughter, who has rejected them based solely on how wide they look. (They do look a lot wider in person.) So I tried them on, and even though I usually wear a size 8.5, I can get my feet into these but my big toes are right at the end. It seems like they run a little large! I have wide feet and there is plenty of room width-wise for my toes, which is nice and makes these shoes a lot more comfortable! They have a lot of cushion and they are very easy to get on, and the quality is very good. Even though they are a little short for me, it's not too bad, so I will definitely wear them and try to stretch them out.

When they say wide, they mean WIDE. I wouldn't say my feet are narrow but they're definitely on the slimmer side, so these shoes look nearly twice as wide as my actual foot lol. Apparently it looks fine from the front though, I asked my family if they looked weird and they said it was fine. These shoes are super comfy all around except for the heel, like where your achilles is. It's stiff and curves in toward the foot, so there's that really uncomfortable blister-inducing rub on the heel. I've tried the usual tricks to get it to soften up but nothing's made it budge yet. With thick enough socks, it's okay and they're comfortable enough to wear for a while
They are so so cute and I really wanted to love them,  but in my normal size (8) my heels slipped out the back and the size down (7) my toes wear crammed in the front.  :/

Named brand shoes need to look out! I just got these shoes and LOVE them. They are a really cool casual style. They are a little wide and I was a little nervous about that. I feel like I have a normal width foot but they fit great! I like the wide look with baggy pants. They are really fun and comfortable. I'd definitely go back and order other colors.

评论概述: a bit TOO wide for me, but still works
评论详情: I got these mostly for around the house shoes.  They will be my first "barefoot shoe" unless one counts Birkenstocks, which I LIVE in in summers.  I have narrow feet, and I trust that even if I did the whole full barefoot "thing" I'd get to average if they splayed out...  I ALMOST sized down a half size due to this but I didn't and they fit okay, but I think I maybe should have.  That being said I'm not certain it would have worked out either.  It is an issue I have with shoes.  The soles of these are thinner than I'm used to, but that is the minimalist/barefoot aspect of them so it is to be expected.  The style is nice and casual, they are easy to slip on and off.  SO if you are a shoes OFF house these are great for by the door.  They were a great test to the barefoot shoes and I like them.

I like that the shoe has no laces and is a slip on . I like the color . I don't like the feel or comfort of the shoe it has little support and not very soft.  The toe of the shoe is VERY wide even for a wide shoe . They are lightweight so that is nice .
